main.name: The Software Developer Story
main.description: I am not an expert programmer but I am a good programmer with good habits
main.bio: My name is Boniface Mwangi, and I am a Software Developer, UI/UX Designer with a wide range of programming skills (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), acquired through education and self taught. I have proficient skills in using UI design tools like figma and quick in learning within a very short time.I have intermidiate skills using MERN (MongoDB, Express, React & Node) Stack.
